summary.span: Пространство имен предоставляет методы, определенные в стандартах LDAP (Lightweight Directory Access Protocol) версии 3 (V3) и DSML (Directory Services Markup Language) версии 2.0 (V2).

span.span: The namespace provides the methods defined in the Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) version 3 (V3) and Directory Services Markup Language (DSML) version 2.0 (V2) standards.
